name: Path of Tengri
description:
[ARROW KEYS] or WASD to move.

[TAB] to move Burg the eagle.

[E] or [SPACE] to interact.

Join Bataar, a dashing young Mongol nomad and his trusty side-kick Burg the eagle as they embark on a journey toward self-discovery! 

Battle desert fiends and build up your strength in your search for divine wisdom on the Mongolian plains. 

Featuring some much-loved JRPG wrestling and some sage life-advice, you're sure to be in for a life-changing adventure.

Team:

  • IsabellaLau: composition and sfx
  • D4yz: pixel art
  • Willowblade: programming

Thanks to Zaraza and Golden for the amazing thorough playtesting
